ProjectTitle: Evaluation of chemotherapy-associated fetal damage in cancer in pregnancy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/06/2022
Please note that the recommendations for storage of clinical research data are now extended to 25 years. 
Please take a look at if KU Leuven RDR is suitable for data sharing, this makes it easier for others to find your data and you can restrict access and so the data access committee can evaluate requests directly via the repository. (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
